info.title: client-accounts
info.description:
This is the entry point for client account inquiries against the record-keeping system.

#### Service Functionality
This API is called with a client account number (`clientAccountId`) parameter.  If found, the resultant resource is a JSON oject, based on the ClientAccount model. 

#### Diagrams
![Interaction](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/sd-client-account%401%2d6.png)
![ClientAccount Model](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/ClientAccount%20Model.png)

#### Performance Expectation
Standard SLA applies.

#### Service Capacity Supported
Standard Capacity applies

#### Suggested Test Scenario
TBD

#### Service Availability:
Standard Service Availability applies

#### Service Security
HTTPS/SSL

get.description: Returns a ClientAccount identified by the input parameter.

parameters.name: clientAccountId
parameters.description: The client number as stored in the record-keeping system.

id.description: The unique identifier for the ClientAccount

accountNumber.description: The Client Account number that is displayed.

accountName.description:
The name given to the account by the client.
Defaults to the head of household's last name.

contactName.description:
Name of the primary contact for the Client Account.
Defaults to the "Head of Household" Client.

address.description: Address model--common model to describe the US Postal Service location.

addressId.description: The Enterprise-wide handle to this individual-address entry.

correlationId.description: An arbitrary id which is used to link two objects which are to be considered identical, based on the lexical rule of equivalence for that class of object.

addressType.description: Type code for type of individual address association in Exceed.

associatedObject.description: The object (Policy, Account, Claim, etc) associated with this individual address.

addressStatus.description: The status of the address in the record keeping system.

addressValidationCode.description: The code provided by the source system that indicates the validation status of the address.

addressAggregate.description: The aggregate address for use when the individual components are not known.

street1.description: First line of the postal address, e.g. 100 Main St.

street2.description: Second line of the postal address, e.g. Unit 100.

countyCode.description: The encoded value for the county.

townshipCode.description: The encoded value for the township.

postalCode.description: The USPS postal code, also known as the zip code.  Should be in the format ##### or #####-#### (zip plus four).

phoneNumber.description: The phone number in the ITU-T E.164.1 Format,

phoneType.description: These enumerations are sourced from Exceed Client

agentId.description: The id of the agent associated with the account.

relatedClients.description: Array of objects containing relatedClients associated to ClientAccount
